mapper.insert: insert into person (mid, pname, pemail, pphone) values (#{mid}, #{pname}, #{pemail}, #{pphone})
mapper.update: update person set pname = #{pname}, pemail = #{pemail}, pphone = #{pphone} where mid = #{mid}
mapper.select: select mid from person where pname = #{pname} and pphone = #{pphone}
select * from person where mid = #{mid} and pphone = #{pphone}
